name: The 4th Dimension (Henry_yin)
description:
Welcome to the world which fulfilled of mysteries and amazement. You, as a player, will act as a directionless and reckless adventurer who wanted to solve and experience various conundrums. 

New adventurers, always remember to be aware of the details within and around the environments. Good Luck!

Control instructions:

W,A,S,D & Backspace control the movements

left Mouse button picking up the items

press E interact with all the mechanisms!

What was the 4th dimension looks like? 

Waiting for you to come and witness!

*Only Lv.1 is downloadable now

     REMEMBER to pick up the cube inside the door to interact with the stela
